entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
